sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY (/* [Sociality_SqlMap.xml] Sociality.create */ USER_ID, INDEX_SOCIALITY, INDEX_INFLUENCE, INDEX_FELLOWSHIP, RANK_SOCIALITY, RANK_INFLUENCE, RANK_FELLOWSHIP, FOLLOWER_COUNT, FOLLOWING_COUNT, BOTH_FOLLOWING_COUNT, TWEET_COUNT, RETWEET_COUNT, BLOG_VISIT_COUNT, MBLOG_GROUP_COUNT, GUESTBOOK_COUNT, UPDATE_DATE, PROFILE_VISIT_COUNT) VALUES (#userId#, #indexSociality#, #indexInfluence#, #indexFellowship#, #rankSociality#, #rankInfluence#, #rankFellowship#, #followerCount#, #followingCount#, #bothFollowingCount#, #tweetCount#, #retweetCount#, #blogVisitCount#, #mblogGroupCount#, #guestbookCount#, SYSDATE, #profileVisitCount#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* [Sociality_SqlMap.xml] Sociality.get */ A.*, B.USER_NAME, B.USER_ENGLISH_NAME, B.TEAM_NAME, B.TEAM_ENGLISH_NAME, B.PICTURE_PATH, B.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH, C.JOB_TITLE_NAME, C.JOB_TITLE_ENGLISH_NAME, 0 AS RNUM, '' AS TOP_PERCENT FROM IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY A, IKEP4_EV_USER B, IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE C WHERE A.USER_ID = #userId# AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.JOB_TITLE_CODE = C.JOB_TITLE_CODE AND B.PORTAL_ID = C.PORTAL_ID
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY /* [Sociality_SqlMap.xml] Sociality.update */ SET INDEX_SOCIALITY = #indexSociality#, INDEX_INFLUENCE = #indexInfluence#, INDEX_FELLOWSHIP = #indexFellowship#, RANK_SOCIALITY = #rankSociality#, RANK_INFLUENCE = #rankInfluence#, RANK_FELLOWSHIP = #rankFellowship#, FOLLOWER_COUNT = #followerCount#, FOLLOWING_COUNT = #followingCount#, BOTH_FOLLOWING_COUNT = #bothFollowingCount#, TWEET_COUNT = #tweetCount#, RETWEET_COUNT = #retweetCount#, BLOG_VISIT_COUNT = #blogVisitCount#, MBLOG_GROUP_COUNT = #mblogGroupCount#, GUESTBOOK_COUNT = #guestbookCount#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE, PROFILE_VISIT_COUNT = #profileVisitCount# WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY /* [Sociality_SqlMap.xml] Sociality.remove */ WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT /* [Sociality_SqlMap.xml] Sociality.count */ COUNT(1) FROM IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY WHERE USER_ID = #userId#

SELECT /* [Sociality_SqlMap.xml] Sociality.countSociality */ COUNT(1) FROM IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY A, IKEP4_EV_USER B, IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE C WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.JOB_TITLE_CODE = C.JOB_TITLE_CODE AND B.PORTAL_ID = C.PORTAL_ID
AND (B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%' OR B.USER_ENGLISH_NAME LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%')

SELECT /* [Sociality_SqlMap.xml] Sociality.listSociality */ * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM (/* START========================================= */ SELECT A.*, B.USER_NAME, B.USER_ENGLISH_NAME, B.TEAM_NAME, B.TEAM_ENGLISH_NAME, B.PICTURE_PATH, B.PROFILE_PICTURE_PATH, C.JOB_TITLE_NAME, C.JOB_TITLE_ENGLISH_NAME, 'TOP ' || ROUND(A.RANK_SOCIALITY*100/#recordCount#, 2) || '%' AS TOP_PERCENT FROM IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY A, IKEP4_EV_USER B, IKEP4_EV_JOB_TITLE C WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.JOB_TITLE_CODE = C.JOB_TITLE_CODE AND B.PORTAL_ID = C.PORTAL_ID
AND (B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%' OR B.USER_ENGLISH_NAME LIKE '%' || #searchText# || '%')
ORDER BY A.INDEX_SOCIALITY DESC
ORDER BY A.INDEX_SOCIALITY ASC
ORDER BY A.INDEX_INFLUENCE DESC
ORDER BY A.INDEX_INFLUENCE ASC
ORDER BY A.INDEX_FELLOWSHIP DESC
ORDER BY A.INDEX_FELLOWSHIP ASC
/* ===========================================END */ ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRowIndex# /* 종료 */ ) WHERE RNUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */
SELECT /* [Sociality_SqlMap.xml] Sociality.getMyRanking */ NVL((SELECT RANK_SOCIALITY FROM IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY WHERE USER_ID = #userId#), (SELECT COUNT(1)+1 FROM IKEP4_SN_SOCIALITY) ) FROM DUAL
